item.title: Single Products
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded:
Category: Smartphones

UltraPhone X1

No Rating Available

UltraPhone X1 combines stunning design and flagship features like high-res camera, AMOLED display, and fast charging in one powerful device.

In Stock $599.99 $549.99
Add To Cart
This Product Has Been Added To The Cart.
View Cart
SKU: 125
  • Description
  • Reviews (0)

Description

Experience premium performance with the UltraPhone X1. Designed for speed and clarity, it features a crisp AMOLED screen, lightning-fast processor, and high-resolution triple camera setup for breathtaking photos. With facial recognition, fingerprint unlock, and long-lasting battery life, it adapts to your day effortlessly. Fast charging keeps you powered up, and the minimalist design offers a sleek, modern feel. Whether you’re a content creator or social media enthusiast, the UltraPhone X1 delivers sophistication, speed, and smart features without compromise.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://wpeshopthree.local.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: UltraPhone X1
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: Experience premium performance with the UltraPhone X1. Designed for speed and clarity, it features a crisp AMOLED screen, lightning-fast processor, and high-resolution triple camera setup for breathtaking photos. With facial recognition, fingerprint unlock, and long-lasting battery life, it adapts to your day effortlessly. Fast charging keeps you powered up, and the minimalist design offers a sleek, modern feel. Whether you're a content creator or social media enthusiast, the UltraPhone X1 delivers sophistication, speed, and smart features without compromise.
item.excerpt:encoded: UltraPhone X1 combines stunning design and flagship features like high-res camera, AMOLED display, and fast charging in one powerful device.

item.title: SoundBeats Pro
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: SoundBeats Pro wireless earbuds deliver powerful sound and complete freedom. With active noise cancellation and deep bass, they offer immersive listening whether you're commuting, exercising, or relaxing. The ergonomic design provides a secure fit, and the charging case offers up to 24 hours of total playback. Built-in microphones ensure clear calls, and touch controls simplify track navigation. Compatible with iOS and Android, these earbuds are perfect for music lovers who demand convenience, quality, and style in one compact package.
item.excerpt:encoded: Enjoy wireless freedom with SoundBeats Pro—featuring noise cancellation, deep bass, and touch control in a sleek, compact design for active lifestyles.

item.title: SkyTab 10
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: The SkyTab 10 offers the perfect blend of performance and portability. Featuring a vibrant 10-inch display, it’s great for binge-watching, browsing, and sketching. Powered by a fast quad-core processor and 4GB RAM, it runs apps smoothly and efficiently. The Android interface makes it user-friendly, and its expandable storage ensures room for all your files. Ideal for students, artists, or everyday users, this lightweight tablet also supports Bluetooth keyboards and styluses, turning it into a mini workstation anytime, anywhere.
item.excerpt:encoded: SkyTab 10 is a high-resolution tablet with a 10-inch screen, powerful processor, and seamless app multitasking for entertainment and work.

item.title: NovaBook Air
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: Designed for productivity and portability, the NovaBook Air is your all-day computing companion. With a slim aluminum body and powerful internals, it handles multitasking with ease. The vibrant Full HD display ensures crisp visuals for streaming and creative work, while the backlit keyboard allows late-night productivity. Equipped with SSD storage, USB-C charging, and up to 12 hours of battery life, the NovaBook Air fits seamlessly into your mobile lifestyle—whether you're working remotely or studying on the go.
item.excerpt:encoded: NovaBook Air is a lightweight, high-performance laptop featuring an ultra-slim body, vivid display, and long battery life—ideal for students and professionals.

item.title: PowerCharge 10000mAh
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: The PowerCharge 10000mAh is a reliable power bank built for life on the move. With dual USB outputs and one Type-C input, you can charge multiple devices simultaneously. Fast-charging support ensures your phone reaches full battery quickly, and the LED indicators help you keep track of remaining power. Its sleek, compact design fits easily in your bag or pocket. Ideal for travelers, students, and professionals, this power bank is a must-have for uninterrupted digital access anytime, anywhere.
item.excerpt:encoded: Keep devices charged on the go with PowerCharge 10000mAh. Lightweight, dual-port output, and fast charging compatible for smartphones, tablets, and more.

item.title: PixelCam GoPro V2
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: The PixelCam GoPro V2 is engineered for thrill-seekers and content creators alike. Record crisp 4K videos and 12MP photos, whether you’re biking, skiing, or surfing. With built-in stabilization and wide-angle lens, your footage stays smooth and immersive. It's waterproof up to 30 meters, and the included mounting accessories make it versatile for any adventure. WiFi connectivity allows instant sharing, and the rechargeable battery ensures long hours of recording. Bring your outdoor stories to life with this action-packed camera.
item.excerpt:encoded: Capture every adventure in stunning 4K with PixelCam GoPro V2, built for durability, waterproof use, and hands-free operation in extreme conditions.

item.title: EchoWave Smartwatch
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: Stay connected and stay fit with the EchoWave Smartwatch. It monitors your heart rate, sleep, steps, and calories burned, keeping your health in check throughout the day. With Bluetooth call, notification sync, and weather updates, it doubles as your digital assistant. Its vibrant AMOLED display offers sharp clarity, while its water-resistant design suits any activity. Compatible with both iOS and Android, the EchoWave is more than just a fitness tracker—it's a style-forward wearable that fits into your daily routine seamlessly.
item.excerpt:encoded: Track your health, calls, and messages with the EchoWave Smartwatch, designed with a sleek interface, vibrant screen, and multiple fitness features.

item.title: Nitro Gaming Mouse
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: The Nitro Gaming Mouse is designed for competitive gamers and productivity seekers alike. Featuring an ergonomic build, high-speed tracking, and adjustable DPI up to 16,000, it ensures accurate and smooth performance. The customizable RGB lighting adds style to your setup, while programmable buttons let you tailor your experience to different games. Built to last and engineered for speed, this mouse is ideal for FPS, MMO, or MOBA enthusiasts who demand reliability and style in every click.
item.excerpt:encoded: Precision meets performance with the Nitro Gaming Mouse featuring adjustable DPI, RGB lighting, and ergonomic comfort for extended gaming sessions and professional use.

item.title: ZenPad Keyboard
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: The ZenPad Keyboard is your go-to companion for a smooth typing experience, designed for tablets and mobile setups. With its ultra-thin profile and responsive keys, it's perfect for those on the move. The wireless connection ensures clutter-free operation, while the long-lasting battery life keeps you productive. Whether you’re typing documents or responding to emails, this keyboard delivers comfort and functionality. Compatible with most tablet brands, it’s ideal for students, professionals, and digital nomads alike.
item.excerpt:encoded: Enhance your productivity with the ZenPad Keyboard, offering responsive keys, wireless connectivity, and a slim design perfect for tablets and compact workstations.

item.title: UltraPhone X1 – Silicone Case
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: This premium silicone case is designed exclusively for the UltraPhone X1. It offers sleek, stylish protection without adding bulk. The anti-slip finish ensures your phone stays secure in your hand, while the soft interior prevents scratches. It's easy to install, fits perfectly, and allows full access to all ports and buttons. Ideal for everyday use and drops.
item.excerpt:encoded: Protect your UltraPhone X1 with this flexible, durable silicone case. Slim design with anti-slip texture for enhanced grip and shock protection.

item.title: Ear Headphones
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: Feel every beat with BassMax Over-Ear Headphones. Designed for audiophiles and casual listeners alike, they deliver powerful bass and crisp treble. The cushioned ear cups ensure comfort during long use, while the foldable design makes them travel-ready. Built-in mic and controls allow hands-free calls and music playback. Wired for consistent quality.
item.excerpt:encoded: Comfortable over-ear headphones with rich bass, noise isolation, and foldable design. Great for music, travel, and long listening sessions.

item.title: SmartHome WiFi Plug
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: Transform ordinary devices into smart ones with the SmartHome WiFi Plug. Plug into any outlet and control your electronics via app or voice command. Schedule on/off times, monitor energy usage, and boost your home’s efficiency. Simple setup and compact design make it perfect for any room. Enhance your smart home ecosystem today.
item.excerpt:encoded: Control your appliances remotely with this smart WiFi plug. Compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant, it features scheduling and energy monitoring.

item.title: VisionPro Monitor 24
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: Upgrade your workspace with the VisionPro Monitor 24. This 24-inch display offers stunning visuals with full HD resolution and vibrant color fidelity. Whether you're editing photos or watching movies, the wide viewing angles and flicker-free technology ensure comfort. Designed for multitaskers, the ultra-thin bezel allows seamless dual monitor setup. HDMI and VGA support included.
item.excerpt:encoded: 24-inch Full HD monitor with vibrant color accuracy, wide viewing angles, and ultra-slim bezels. Ideal for work or entertainment.

item.title: Bluetooth Speaker
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: Take your music anywhere with the UltraSound Bluetooth Speaker. Featuring rich audio, enhanced bass, and long battery life, it’s perfect for beach trips, picnics, or house parties. Connect instantly via Bluetooth and enjoy hands-free calls with the built-in mic. The compact size fits easily in your bag, and its rugged exterior ensures durability.
item.excerpt:encoded: Compact Bluetooth speaker with deep bass, 10-hour battery, and splash resistance. Great for indoor and outdoor music enjoyment.

item.title: ChargeMate 3-in-1 Cable
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: No more cable clutter. The ChargeMate 3-in-1 Cable is the perfect solution for households with multiple devices. Whether you’re charging your iPhone, Android, or tablet, it supports fast charging and quick data transfer. Its braided exterior resists wear and tear, and the connectors are reinforced for longevity. Ideal for travel and daily use
item.excerpt:encoded: Universal 3-in-1 charging cable with USB-C, Lightning, and Micro USB. Durable, tangle-free design for fast charging and data sync.

item.title: AirCool Wireless Fan
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: The AirCool Wireless Fan offers instant relief from the heat. Its powerful motor provides adjustable airflow, while the cordless design ensures mobility. Perfect for desks, camping, or travel. Recharge with any USB port and enjoy hours of cooling on a single charge. Silent operation and a stable base make it ideal for both home and office environments.
item.excerpt:encoded: Portable wireless fan with USB charging, three speed settings, and a compact design. Stay cool wherever you go, indoors or outdoors.

item.title: SmartLamp LED Light
item.dc:creator: anantlite
item.content:encoded: Brighten your space with the SmartLamp LED Light, featuring energy-efficient illumination and customizable settings. Control brightness, colors, and scheduling via the SmartLamp app, compatible with iOS and Android. Whether you're reading, working, or relaxing, the SmartLamp adapts to your needs. Sleek and stylish, it fits any room decor. Set timers, group with other smart devices, and enjoy mood-enhancing light every day.
item.excerpt:encoded: A smart LED lamp with adjustable brightness, color control, and remote access via your smartphone. Perfect for modern homes and workspaces.
